headline: A Viral Blog Post Slams Stocks. Fear About AI Is Real.
summary: The Substack post envisions an economy in 2028 in which AI has triggered mass layoffs and disrupted large-cap stocks like DoorDash and Uber.

headline: The Viral Citrini Substack Post That's Sparking New AI Worries on Wall Street
summary: Is AI bullish for the economy, or bearish? Maybe it's so bullish that it becomes bearish. That's the conceit of a viral Substack post from Citrini Research painting a dark portrait of a future scenario in which AI inspires a race to the bottom in white-collar knowledge work.

headline: DoorDash, Booking, Chewy, Wayfair, and Expedia Shares Plummet, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks fell in the morning session after the announcement of new tariffs on imported goods, sparked investor concern about rising costs for consumer-facing companies.

headline: Software, Payments Shares Tumble After Citrini Post on AI Risks
summary: DoorDash Inc., American Express Co. and Blackstone Inc all slumped more than 7%.  Shares of other companies name-checked in the article, including Uber Technologies Inc., Mastercard Inc., Visa Inc, Capital One Financial Corp., Apollo Global Management Inc. and KKR & Co. Inc. were all lower by at least 3%.

headline: Dystopian AI report sinks DoorDash, software stocks
summary: Investing.com -- DoorDash shares fell 7% on Monday, while Uber dropped 3%, Salesforce declined 4%, MongoDB slid 6%, and ServiceNow lost 4%, following publication of a dystopian scenario analysis from Citirini Research examining potential risks from rapid AI advancement. Visa and Mastercard also declined, falling over 2%.

headline: 5,000 Flights Canceled, Roads Closed: Northeast Blizzard Puts Airlines, Delivery Firms And Energy Stocks In Spotlight
summary: In response to a powerful winter storm, major Northeast cities, including New York City, have declared states of emergency and imposed travel bans, triggering widespread flight cancellations and delays across the region.
